name: Spring Boot (via SDKMAN)
description:
Spring Boot takes an opinionated view of building production-ready Spring
applications. It favors convention over configuration and is designed to get you
up and running as quickly as possible.

version.description: Select the version of Spring Boot to install.

jdkVersion.description: Select or enter a JDK version to install.

jdkDistro.description: Select or enter a JDK distribution to install
